Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 64th/Stony Island
ShortDescription: Westbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Stony Island, Marquette, Cornell and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 64th/Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Stony Island, Marquette, Cornell and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 64th/Stony Island.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #111 111th/King Drive Temporary Southbound Reroute near 111th/Princeton
ShortDescription: Southbound 111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Wentworth, 115th, Halsted and 115th due to street blockage near 111th/Princeton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Wentworth, 115th, Halsted and 115th due to street blockage near 111th/Princeton.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 54th/Cermak and Kedzie
ShortDescription: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Kedzie due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Kedzie due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Kedzie and The Loop at this time.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

 At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays on Loop 'L' (elevated lines)
ShortDescription: Brown and Green Line trains are experiencing delays due to debris on the tracks near Clark/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown and Green Line trains are experiencing delays due to debris on the tracks near Clark/Lake.  Brown Line train are being rerouted to the Inner Loop Purple Line side, Green Line trains are being rerouted to the Inner Loop Orange Line side.

Crews are working to correct the problem.

Allow extra travel time.
